Articles.Content:
Hello, 

I installed from the forum link(spacedock) and installed like any other mod but only the parts show up, no controller whatsoever, any help is very appreciated.

thanks,

Jamie

What version of KSP are you using? I have it installed in the 1.3.1 and I got some work to make it function properly, since it don't seem to be updated for a long time.

In the topic you can get more info:

I installed Infernal Robotics - Next and everything works on KSP 1.4.1, 64bits. It's still beta but so far had no problem. I added Utlitrons (landing foot, grabbers, sampler) from older versions of Rework.

To control it's moving parts you need to find and press IR's toolbar button which brings the servo control window, or use actions.

But I couldn't get the Sequencer from the same page to work and it doesn't appear in the toolbars and couldn't find any help in this regard (tested both releases for 1.4.1 and 1.4.2)..
